t: Amazon.com: Michael's Metal Art
s: I design and produce metal art and signs..Using my CNC plasma machine that I built from scratch, I am able to cut steel into beautiful objects such as clocks, wall art, address signs and all sorts of home decor . I do not paint my products.. I powder coat them!!
